home.intro: I’m Guilherme, a Data Scientist|Engineer, fusing technology and data into extraordinary solutions.
home.quote: Numbers whisper the truth; my quest is to uncover the hidden patterns shaping our world.
home.mission: My mission is to transform raw data into meaningful narratives that drive understanding and impact.
home.passion: What excites me is the ability to turn complex datasets into real-world insights that matter.

education.details: Thesis: Migration Dynamics in Brazil: A Spatial Econometric Analysis
Thesis: Higher Education, Economic Complexity, and Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil. A Geographically Weighted Regression Approach

experience.description: Development of data pipelines that ensure data quality and availability, consultancy for external clients, and AI experimentation.
Cloud and Data consultancy, with Azure, GCP, Terraform, Python, and Bash, mostly.

experience.role: Census Agent for Admnistration and informatics
experience.company: IBGE (Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics)
experience.description: Field research for the 2022 Brazilian Census. Management of human resources and training of new Field Census Agents. Allocation of equipment and materials to the field agents.
Development of pipelines for time series forecasting, with Bash, Python, R, and Azure.
Data Science consultancy in various projects, using R, Python, Docker, JS, CSS, SQL, Postgres, MongoDB, GCP, AWS, Terraform.

items.title: Migration Dynamics in Brazil
items.subtitle:
A Spatial Econometric Analysis 
Masters thesis' awarded merit-based fellowship in the Erasmus Mundus GeoSpatial Technologies program 2025
R, Python, Terraform, Docker, GCP, BigQuery, DataForm, SQL, SQLX, JS, GWR, MGWR

items.title: Higher Education, Economic Complexity, and Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil
items.subtitle:
A Geographically Weighted Regression Approach 
Bachelor thesis for the degree of Economic Sciences Bachelor 
R, Python, GWR

items.title: Export complexity, industrial complexity and regional economic growth in Brazil

A comparision of various complexity (ECI) metrics with Brazilian exports and employment data 
Python, R, Shiny

items.title: Notes on the Census Microdata
items.subtitle:
Extracting, Transforming, and Loading with Bash, PySpark, and Cloud Storage 
Python, PySpark, HDFS, Big Data, Micro Data, Census

items.title: Geographic Normalization
items.subtitle:
What is it and what are its implications? 
R, Spatial Statistics, Data Visualization

items.title: Money Neutrality in the Covid19 Era
items.subtitle:
An Animated Analysis with R 
Based on economic models, the idea of money neutrality is explained in an animated way. Guilherme rightly predicts inflation in the medium term, as expantionary monetary policies were applied to mitigate the Covid effects. In the long term, 'inflation is nothing but a monetary phenomena'

items.title: Socioeconomic Observatory of Santa Catarina
items.subtitle:
OSESC 
A dashboard to analyse and forecast time series of Brazilian socio-economic data, with focus on the state of Santa Catarina

home.intro: Ich bin Guilherme, ein Datenwissenschaftler|Ingenieur, der Technologie und Daten zu außergewöhnlichen Lösungen verschmilzt.
home.quote: Zahlen flüstern die Wahrheit; meine Suche gilt den verborgenen Mustern, die unsere Welt formen.
home.mission: Meine Mission ist es, rohe Daten in bedeutungsvolle Erzählungen zu verwandeln, die Verständnis und Wirkung fördern.
home.passion: Was mich begeistert, ist die Fähigkeit, komplexe Datensätze in reale Erkenntnisse zu verwandeln, die zählen.

cv.title: Lebenslauf
cv.summary: Ein visionärer Datenprofi, der Kreativität mit analytischer Präzision verbindet.

education.details: Thesis: Migrationsdynamiken in Brasilien: Eine räumliche ökonometrische Analyse
Thesis: Hochschulbildung, wirtschaftliche Komplexität und Wissensspillover in den Mikroregionen Brasiliens. Ein geografisch gewichteter Regressionsansatz

experience.description: Entwicklung von Datenpipelines, die Datenqualität und Verfügbarkeit sicherstellen, Beratung für externe Kunden und Experimente mit KI.
Cloud- und Datenberatung, hauptsächlich mit Azure, GCP, Terraform, Python und Bash.

experience.company: IBGE (Brasilianisches Institut für Geografie und Statistik)

Entwicklung von Pipelines für Zeitreihenprognosen mit Bash, Python, R und Azure.
Datenwissenschaftsberatung in verschiedenen Projekten mit R, Python, Docker, JS, SQL, Postgres, GCP, AWS, Terraform.
